site_name: William Perkin C Of E High School
description: Application for a non-material amendment in relation to planning application PP/2014/5207 dated 09/10/2015 for 'Part single, part two storey community sports pavilion with team changing rooms, community room, ancillary offices and accommodation; artificial sports pitch, boundary fencing and flood lighting (following removal of existing artificial pitch and floodlighting) (Regulation 3 - Council's own development)'. Non-material amendment seeking to omit roof terrace canopy, omit PV panels, reduction of building height by 600mm, repositioning of vents on north and south fa√ßades, recessed brick detail added to east elevation, relocation of external bin storage and replacement of 40 sq. m. of bitmac with grass
